text: Nuna'amo'a nefama anteno masegeno komatia nanterana, nagana'amofona amanage huno asami'ne, Hago nagra kenage nerafa'ene mase'noanki meni kenage anahu kna huta hanave ti ami'manenkeno neteno, ete negi nenena anukinka masetegeta, nagati'amofo zamagi fanane huzankura nafati'amofo mofavre tamu'ene huta kasenta'maneno, huno hige'ne,
